docs.snippet: Percy Harvin sustained a concussion when he struck his head on the turf after being hit in last week’s game against New Orleans....
docs.lead_paragraph: Percy Harvin sustained a concussion when he struck his head on the turf after being hit in last week’s game against New Orleans.
docs.abstract: NFL Roundup; Seattle Seahawks wide receiver Percy Harvin will miss the NFC championship after sustaining concussion in game against New Orleans Saints; other football news noted.

headline.main: Seahawks’ Harvin Will Miss the N.F.C. Championship Game
headline.print_headline: Seahawks’ Harvin Will Miss the N.F.C. Championship Game

docs.snippet: Peyton Manning’s late-career Super Bowl bid and his rivalry with the Patriots’ Tom Brady are thrilling to John Elway, who can relate....
docs.lead_paragraph: Peyton Manning’s late-career Super Bowl bid and his rivalry with the Patriots’ Tom Brady are thrilling to John Elway, who can relate.
docs.abstract: Late-career Super Bowl bid by Denver Broncos quarterback Peyton Manning, and his rivalry with New England Patriots quarterback Tom Brady, have been thrilling to Broncos' executive vice president John Elway; drama recalls Elway's own experience as a Broncos quarterback.

headline.main: Two Broncos Quarterbacks, Sparkling in the Twilight

byline.contributor: Peter May contributed reporting from Boston.

docs.snippet: Jersey City reworked a mural by Abdul Gonsalves, the graffiti artist Paws21, to cover up letters in the N.F.L. shield; also, an irate mayor, and a prescient camel....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jersey City reworked a mural by Abdul Gonsalves, the graffiti artist Paws21, to cover up letters in the N.F.L. shield; also, an irate mayor, and a prescient camel.
docs.abstract: Jersey City officials, concerned about trademark permissions ahead of Super Bowl, rework mural by Abdul Gonsalves, graffiti artist known as Paws21, to cover up letters NFL, in design resembling National Football League's logol; East Rutherford, NJ, Mayor James L Cassella takes issue with Verizon FiOS advertisement; Princess, Bactrian camel with knack for picking Super Bowl winners, is euthanized (Series: Super Bowl XLVIII).

headline.main: The Mystery of Three Letters That Disappeared
headline.print_headline: Why Three Letters Disappeared From a New Jersey Mural
